properties.areaDesc: Central Interior; Middle Tanana Valley; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands; Eastern Alaska Range; Denali; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country; Upper Koyukuk Valley; Southeastern Brooks Range; Deltana and Tanana Flats
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 9 at 12:14PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
After a weekend warm up across the interior of Alaska expect the
return of the -20 to -40 temperatures as the work week progresses.

Siberian high pressure will move into the region early this week
after the storm system moves aways that brought a fresh coating of
snow. This high pressure system will bring clearing skies and very
cold temperatures.

The cold looks to last into the next weekend, however computer
models have low confidence in the length of the cold snap.

Residents should prepare for cold temperatures, especially if
traveling, by keeping cold weather gear available at all times.

For the latest forecast go to www.weather.gov/afg

NWSheadline: The cold of winter 2020 returns again
